article_metadata.description: The past seven years since the financial crisis have seen the S&P 500 bounce back by 150%, even as GDP growth continues to be slow. Digging deeper, stagnant wages and extremely low productivity growth show that the real economy has not kept pace with Wall Street. Inevitably, that gap was going [...]
